movie_title: 5 Must-Know English Words: Goals & Progress Vocabulary
introduction:
This is the best video to start building your English vocabulary.
https://tinyurl.com/wbtvrje3 Click

vocabulary.definition: to succeed in reaching a goal through effort
vocabulary.example: She hopes to achieve a promotion at work this year.

vocabulary.definition: to get ready for something in advance
vocabulary.example: They need to prepare the venue for the upcoming event.

vocabulary.definition: to keep or store something for future use, especially money or time
vocabulary.example: He wants to save enough money to buy a new car next year.

vocabulary.definition: to make or bring something new into existence
vocabulary.example: The artist plans to create a series of paintings inspired by nature.

vocabulary.definition: to make something better or become better
vocabulary.example: She aims to improve her language skills by practicing regularly.

vocabulary.definition: a room at the entrance of a building where people can wait or get information
vocabulary.example: The hotel lobby was elegantly decorated with comfortable seating.
